TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TargetConverter extends System.ComponentModel.StringConverter

Docs.summary: Converts a value that represents the location (target) in which to display the content resulting from a Web navigation to a string. This class also converts a string to a target value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The TargetConverter class creates a collection of values that can be used to specify the location in which to display content resulting from a Web navigation, such as the page navigated to when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is clicked. This collection is commonly used in a designer to display a list of values that can be used for the `Target` property of a navigation control, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter/StandardValuesCollection GetStandardValues(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
Docs.summary: Returns a collection of standard values from the default context for the data type this type converter is designed for.
Docs.returns: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing a standard set of valid values, or if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is an internal-only class.

Docs.value: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> containing a standard set of valid values, or if the data type does not support a standard set of values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool GetStandardValuesExclusive(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An that provides a format context.
Docs.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the collection of standard values returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TargetConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> method is an exclusive list.
Docs.returns: if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.TypeConverter.StandardValuesCollection> returned from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TargetConverter.GetStandardValues%2A> is an exhaustive list of possible values; if other values are possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is an internal-only class.
